title: Corporate Espionage Office Adventure #53
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Open Office Cubicle Floor
rooms.description: A dimly lit office floor filled with rows of gray cubicles. Computer monitors glow with screensavers, and the hum of fluorescent lights fills the air. Papers are scattered across desks, and the smell of stale coffee lingers. Security cameras blink red in the corners. You need to find a way to the executive level before security discovers you.

items.name: employee desk
items.description: A cluttered desk with a computer, papers, and personal items

items.name: employee ID badge
items.description: An access badge belonging to a junior employee, grants basic access

items.name: metal filing cabinet
items.description: A standard office filing cabinet with three drawers

items.name: company directory
items.description: A printed directory listing all employees and departments
items.text: SYNTECH INDUSTRIES DIRECTORY - Founded 1987. CEO: Victoria Blackwell. CFO: Robert Chen. Head of Security: Marcus Stone. Departments: Research & Development (3rd Floor), Executive Offices (5th Floor), Server Room (Basement Level).

items.name: executive access keycard
items.description: A high-level keycard with 'EXECUTIVE ACCESS' printed in gold letters

items.name: break room table
items.description: A table in the corner break area with coffee mugs and newspapers

items.name: business newspaper
items.description: A newspaper with an article about SynTech Industries
items.text: BUSINESS WEEKLY: SynTech Industries celebrates 36 years of innovation. CEO Victoria Blackwell states: 'Our proprietary data is stored in the most secure server room in the industry. Only authorized personnel with proper credentials can access it.'

items.name: supply closet
items.description: A locked closet containing office supplies and equipment

items.name: maintenance memo
items.description: An internal memo about security systems
items.text: MEMO: Security Update - The middle drawer combination has been reset to the company founding year (1987). Executive offices require executive keycards. Remember: CEO Blackwell's office contains access to all secure areas.

items.name: office water cooler
items.description: A standard water cooler with a bulletin board above it
items.text: Bulletin Board: 'Employee of the Month: Sarah Martinez - Research & Development. Reminder: All confidential documents must be stored in executive offices. Server room access restricted to C-level executives only.'

items.name: elevator to executive floor
items.description: A sleek elevator with a card reader. A sign reads 'Executive Level - Authorized Personnel Only'

rooms.name: Executive Office Suite
rooms.description: A luxurious office suite with mahogany furniture and floor-to-ceiling windows overlooking the city. Abstract art hangs on the walls. A massive desk dominates the room, and a wall safe is visible behind a painting. The air smells of expensive leather and cologne. A secure door leads to the server room.

items.name: CEO's desk
items.description: An imposing mahogany desk with a leather chair and multiple locked compartments

items.name: executive calendar
items.description: A leather-bound planner with appointments and notes
items.text: Victoria Blackwell's Calendar - Meeting with Head of Security Marcus Stone at 3pm. Note to self: Server room access code is office extension (5309). Must review R&D reports from Research & Development department.

items.name: server room access key
items.description: A high-security key labeled 'SERVER ROOM - AUTHORIZED ACCESS ONLY'

items.name: executive bookshelf
items.description: A tall bookshelf filled with business books and corporate awards

items.name: annual report
items.description: SynTech Industries' latest annual report
items.text: SYNTECH INDUSTRIES ANNUAL REPORT: Under CEO Victoria Blackwell's leadership, our Research & Development division continues to innovate. Our secure data storage in the server room basement ensures all proprietary information remains protected.

items.name: abstract painting
items.description: An expensive abstract painting that appears to hide something behind it

items.name: handwritten security note
items.description: A note hidden behind the painting
items.text: CONFIDENTIAL: Server room security protocol requires three-factor authentication. Questions verify identity: 1) Who is the CEO? 2) What department handles innovation? 3) Where is secure data stored? - M. Stone, Head of Security

items.name: conference table
items.description: A polished table with leather chairs and presentation materials
items.text: Presentation slides visible: 'SynTech Industries - Leading Innovation Since 1987. CEO Victoria Blackwell's vision drives our success. Our Research & Development team creates tomorrow's technology today.'

items.name: secure server room door
items.description: A reinforced steel door with biometric scanner and security panel. Three verification questions are displayed on the screen.

password_questions.question: Who is the company CEO?
password_questions.hint: Check the company directory and executive documents

password_questions.question: What department handles innovation?
password_questions.hint: Multiple documents mention which department creates new technology

password_questions.question: Where is secure data stored?
password_questions.hint: The annual report and newspaper article mention the location

rooms.name: Secure Server Room
rooms.description: You've made it to the server room! Rows of humming servers line the walls, their lights blinking in synchronized patterns. The air is cool and dry, maintained by industrial air conditioning. Cables run across the ceiling like technological vines. At the far end, an emergency exit door glows green - your escape route to the parking garage and freedom.

items.name: server racks
items.description: Tall racks filled with powerful servers containing all company data

items.name: backup terminal
items.description: A computer terminal for system administration
items.text: SYSTEM STATUS: All data secure. Backup complete. Emergency exit protocol: Exit leads to underground parking garage. You're almost free.

items.name: illuminated emergency exit
items.description: A green exit sign pointing to the escape route

rooms.win_message: SUCCESS! You've accessed the server room and reached the emergency exit. As you push through the door into the parking garage, cool night air hits your face. You've successfully infiltrated SynTech Industries, gathered the intelligence you needed, and escaped undetected. Your mission is complete. You win!
